fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: We are members of ESCO and participate in the Social Dialoge
organisation_name: NITO The Norwegian assosiation for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists (NITO BFI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: European Association for Professions in Biomedical Science, EPBS. www.epbs.net.
goals__remit: A professional assosiation for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists. Working for the professional and ethical standard for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists. Working for the authorisation, competence and the professional role for Biomedical Laboratory Scientists in the Health system.
